# Approval Workflow

## Purpose
Define authority and accountability for governance decisions.

## Approval Roles
- Domain Owner
- Compliance Authority
- Architecture Authority

## Approval Rules
- All instruction changes require approval.
- Prompt changes require architecture approval.
- Emergency approvals must be time-bound and reviewed.

## Evidence Requirements
- Approval decisions must be documented.
- Rationale must be recorded.
- Decision history must be retained.

## Prohibited
- Implicit approval
- Verbal-only authorization
- Undocumented governance decisions
